meanings.definition: A large passenger aircraft designed for long-distance travel.
meanings.sent1: The airbuses soared high above the clouds.
meanings.sent2: The airport had many airbuses waiting to take off.
meanings.sent3: The airbuses decided to have a race in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The airbuses lined up on the runway like giant birds ready to take flight.
meanings.sent5: The noise of the airbuses taking off was deafening.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'airbus', referring to multiple large passenger aircraft.
meanings.sent1: We saw a fleet of airbuses flying in formation.
meanings.sent2: The airbuses were all painted in bright colors.
meanings.sent3: The airbuses gathered for a group photo in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The airbuses filled the sky like a flock of migrating birds.
meanings.sent5: The airbuses landed one by one, creating a symphony of engine sounds.
